info.title: Airport Control System API
info.description: API documentation for Airport Control System

get.description: Retrieve a user by their ID

put.description: Update user flight shift by id

delete.summary: Delete user flight shift by id
delete.description: Delete user flight shift by id

get.description: Lấy chi tiết một công việc theo id

put.description: Cập nhật một công việc theo id

delete.description: Xoá một công việc theo id

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users

post.description: Save Expo Push Token for the current user
Apply a new user flight shift

get.description: Retrieve a list of all teams

post.description: Create a new team with the provided details

get.description: Lấy danh sách tất cả công việc

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Search users by keyword (name or email)
Get the current user based on token
Filter users by team, unit, or search text
Retrieve a list of all user flight shifts (DTO only)

200.description: Successfully retrieved all user flight shifts

get.summary: Get user flight shifts by flight and date
get.description: Retrieve user flight shifts by flight and date

200.description: Successfully retrieved user flight shifts by flight and date

Successfully retrieved assigned user flight shifts

get.summary: Check if user is assigned to flight
get.description: Check if a user is assigned to a flight on a specific date
Filter user flight shifts by criteria
